about_the_game:
This demo is the entire first chapter of the game, out of a planned six. Make friends and spend your time relaxing around Wellington as Miho gets used to her new life.

Please be aware that this demo runs on a different engine than the full game. While the content is identical, the system requirements for the full game are somewhat higher. We're working to get the demo remade on the new engine as well, and will remove this text when it's been updated.
detailed_description:
This demo is the entire first chapter of the game, out of a planned six. Make friends and spend your time relaxing around Wellington as Miho gets used to her new life.

Please be aware that this demo runs on a different engine than the full game. While the content is identical, the system requirements for the full game are somewhat higher. We're working to get the demo remade on the new engine as well, and will remove this text when it's been updated.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any reasonably modern Linux distribution (※ Roughly equivalent to Ubuntu 16.04 or above.)
  • Processor: Any 64-bit Intel, AMD, or ARM / Apple Silicon CPU (※ Earning Steam achievements / trophies on ARM Linux requires x86_64 translation.)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports at least OpenGL 2.0 or OpenGL ES 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: ※ Tested on Ubuntu 22.10 (x86_64) and Asahi Linux (arm64e, Apple Silicon).

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS / OS X 10.10 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: Any 64-bit Intel, AMD, or ARM / Apple Silicon CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports at least Metal, OpenGL 2.0, or OpenGL ES 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Please Be Happy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Any 64-bit Intel, AMD, or ARM / Apple Silicon CPU (※ x86_64 translation is required on ARM / Apple Silicon.)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU that supports at least OpenGL 2.0, OpenGL ES 2.0, or DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: A comfy yuri visual novel with two heroines to choose from, with a relaxing story. Play as the foxgirl Miho as she makes a new life for herself in a fantasy version of Wellington, New Zealand.
